item.title: TheFletcher by Shahar Avain
item.dc:creator: @Shahar_Avain Shahar Avain
item.description:
@Shahar_Avain wrote:

This took me a while to figure out. It banks, gets logs, fletches em, puts em back, and goes again. Note that First, you need to put your logs in the first bank spot, the logout, login, and make sure your view is facing the third bank in VARROCK EAST BANK the one near the rune shop, and as FAR UP as you can go(looking down). You must have a knife out. If you think it stalled after your done fletching, it didnt, I just gave it a bit of extra time to make sure itâ€™s done.

program TheFletcher;

const
Message1='27';
procedure Fletch;
begin
movemousesmooth(261,152);
wait(450);
clickmouse(261,152,true);
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(308,475);
wait(450);
clickmouse(308,475,true);
wait(1000);
movemousesmooth(286,420);
wait(700);
clickmouse(286,420,true);
wait(700);
movemousesmooth(95,109);
wait(700);
clickmouse(95,109,false)
wait(700);
movemousesmooth(98,179);
wait(700);
clickmouse(98,179,true);
wait(700);
movemousesmooth(442,68);
wait(700)
clickmouse(442,68,true);
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(589,256);
wait(500);
clickmouse(589,256,true);
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(624,256);
wait(500);
clickmouse(624,256,true);
wait(1000);
movemousesmooth(328,448);
wait(500);
clickmouse(328,448,false);
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(333,458);
wait(500);
clickmouse(333,458,true);
wait(1000);
sendkeys(message1);
sendkeysVB('{ENTER}',false);
wait(55000);
movemousesmooth(261,152);
wait(450);
clickmouse(261,152,true);
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(308,475);
wait(450);
clickmouse(308,475,true);
wait(1000);
movemousesmooth(286,420);
wait(700);
clickmouse(286,420,true);
wait(700);
movemousesmooth(624,256);
wait(500);
clickmouse(624,256,false);
wait(1000);
movemousesmooth(604,332);
wait(450);
clickmouse(604,332,true);
wait(2000);
movemousesmooth(458,72);
clickmouse(458,72,true);
wait(2000)







end;
begin
repeat
fletch;
until(false)
end.
